siteMetadata.title: Blog by Vindhya C
siteMetadata.subtitle: Always looking for learning opportunities in product and life.

frontmatter.title: How did I get into Product Management?
frontmatter.description: This is a story. You should probably skip this if you were looking for steps, that blog will be up next. But if you were just curious & if you think my way could help you, read away :)

frontmatter.title: Building a clubhouse for India - A playbook
frontmatter.description: Clubhouse works because of its exclusivity, a very well known virality hack. This also means like HQ trivia once it all dies down, it could not go as well as one would hope.

frontmatter.title: How to run Product sprints ?
frontmatter.description: You all have heard of the design sprint if you have not, read more here.  It was introduced inside Google & has been widely adapted, however working with this book has enabled me to think of a  product sprint inspired by this, Let me explain how it would work.

frontmatter.title: When to hire your first product person?
frontmatter.description: I have been talking to few startups and this is a common theme that keeps coming up, so I wanted to write this down.

frontmatter.title: Where could UrbanClap head next?
frontmatter.description: I have been thinking on what UC could improve on & change in the app. I realised while these tiny increments help the product move forward, the people with internal access to data and users have obviously uncovered them & will be actively working on these.

frontmatter.title: What Product or Features Should You Develop Next?
frontmatter.description: I have been reading a lot about feature prioritization and attracting newer audiences, and I want to put what I have been learning into practice, which is what motivated this post.

frontmatter.title: 15 Take Aways From Being a Product Manager at a High Growth Startup
frontmatter.description: This month, exactly a a year ago, Loco happened to me, or we happened to each other. Here are fifteen things I took away that I thought would be useful to other product managers.

frontmatter.title: 10 Things Every Product Manager Can Learn From Headspace
frontmatter.description: Headspace is one of my favourite apps right now, not just because I derive great value from it but also because it really taught me how to catch my breath, every once in a while.

frontmatter.title: 5 things I love about being in a Product company over Service based industry
frontmatter.description: This story is for the folks that are just starting out and have no idea what any industry jargon means. These are thing I wish someone told me at 22!
